Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.toCLI.interfaces

Interface CLIPrintFunction

public interface CLIPrintFunction
Interface with methods to help the CLIStatusClasses and CLISubTurnCLasses to print image o message
Author:
Marco

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.String increaseLengthWithSpace​(java.lang.String string, int stringLength, int finalLength)
    Method which adds spaces to String as long as string's length == final length.
    static void printAtTheMiddle​(java.lang.String style, java.lang.String middleString, int stringLength, int totalLength)
    Method which prints on standard output a String with the chosen type at the middle of a chosen length of space using printRepeatString.

    • printError

      static void printError​(java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Prints errorMessage with color and symbol of ERROR_COLOR_AND_SYMBOL
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - String to print

    • printCheck

      static void printCheck​(java.lang.String checkMessage)
      Prints checkMessage with color and symbol of CORRECT_COLOR_AND_SYMBOL
      Parameters:
      checkMessage - String to print

    • printRepeatString

      static void printRepeatString​(java.lang.String style, java.lang.String string, int repeatsNumber)
      Methods that implements a for cycle to print on standard output a chosen String with the chosen style for a chosen number of times
      Parameters:
      style - String to resent the style
      string - String to print
      repeatsNumber - number of times to print the chosen String

    • printAtTheMiddle

      static void printAtTheMiddle​(java.lang.String style, java.lang.String middleString, int stringLength, int totalLength)
      Method which prints on standard output a String with the chosen type at the middle of a chosen length of space using printRepeatString. It prints middleString with style if stringLength is more than totalLength
      Parameters:
      style - String to represent the style
      middleString - String to print
      stringLength - length of the middleString
      totalLength - length of space where middleString is printed

    • increaseLengthWithSpace

      static java.lang.String increaseLengthWithSpace​(java.lang.String string, int stringLength, int finalLength)
      Method which adds spaces to String as long as string's length == final length. If stringLength less than finalLength, it returns string
      Parameters:
      string - initial String
      stringLength - string's length
      finalLength - final length chosen
      Returns:
      String with length == finalLength, if stringLength less than finalLength
